org.simplity.kernel.data

Interface FieldsInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonDataInterface, DataSheet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonData, DataRow, DynamicSheet, Fields, MultiRowsSheet, ServiceContext, SingleRowSheet

    public interface FieldsInterface
    A simple name-value pair Map.we have created this wrapper class to allow us to extend it
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Map.Entry<String,Value>> getAllFields() 
      Value getValue(String fieldName)
      get field value, or null if no such field
      boolean hasValue(String fieldName)
      do we have a field with this name?
      Value removeValue(String fieldName)
      remove value
      void setValue(String fieldName, Value value)
      set/reset value to a field.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        Value getValue(String fieldName)
        get field value, or null if no such field
        Parameters:
        fieldName -
        Returns:
        value or null if field does not exist

      • setValue

        void setValue(String fieldName,
              Value value)
        set/reset value to a field.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - not null
        value - not null, but vaule.isNull() could be true

      • hasValue

        boolean hasValue(String fieldName)
        do we have a field with this name?
        Parameters:
        fieldName -
        Returns:
        true if field exists. False otherwise.

      • removeValue

        Value removeValue(String fieldName)
        remove value
        Parameters:
        fieldName -
        Returns:
        existing value or null

      • getAllFields

        Set<Map.Entry<String,Value>> getAllFields()
        Returns:
        an iterator for accessing all fields as an entry of name-value for current row
